Nice fan trailer. Not to be mean here. However, if Kara was to go any 
further then it's Demo trailer. I hope Quantic Dream would turn into a 
dramatic sci-fi video game with difficult choices to make. Pushing games

+Nina Demoustier
Actually, I was curious on what Quantic Dream was currently working on. and 
came across IGN reports on Quantic Dream Registers SingularityPS4.com. 
Which in theory base off a book called:"The Singularity Is Near" Which is 
base off the idea of thinking androids.or something that thinks beyond 
human understanding. The way I understand it. So, we may get something near 
Kara game.

At the same time. the only report I could find from Quantic Dream 
themselves. Is a statement saying "their next project will focus on 
emotions." and with them that can mean anything.
I totally agree, I would have loved to have more than a Demo trailer.

Well, I am not a proffessional vidder and it is not my job to do videos so 
I don't speak out of "real knowledge" but I think creating a movie about it 
would costs a lot just for the effects it requires and also to hire all the 
actors. And same for the game, because what they released was just a demo, 
I don't think they wrote all the storyline so they would need to write it, 
hire actors and it would take months to film it or months to do a proper 
beta version of the game. Like I said, I just assume it would be hard to 
make it happend but I could be wrong :) Hope I've answered your question!
